name: The Great Stones Alpha 2
description:
Story: Evil forces from the void have come in an attempt to mind control everyone by stealing the great stones. When they have a stone, they can mind control everyone in the stone's area.  You have decided to stop this from happening by taking the stones away from them. However, this won't be an easy task, the stones are held in temples guarded by minions. You must defeat the minions, and take the stones away from them.

If your bored, you can just entertain yourself with this fun 20 minute action/adventure game.
